title: How to Download and Install Themes on the PSP

steps.title: Select theme then click download.
steps.content: Select theme then click download. Save it in a place where you can find it easily.

steps.title: Use the cable to connect the PSP to the computer and connect it.
steps.content: Use the cable to connect the PSP to the computer and connect it.

steps.title: Go to the file PSP and make a new folder with the name "THEME".
steps.content: Go to the file PSP and make a new folder with the name "THEME".

steps.title: Paste the .ptf file in the theme folder.
steps.content: Paste the .ptf file in the theme folder.

steps.title: Go to the same website given above.
steps.content: Go to the same website given above.

steps.title: It will be saved automatically on the theme file.
steps.content: It will be saved automatically on the theme file.
